<p>
This interactive visualisation allows the exploration of mines of the Roman Empire from the <a href="oxrep.classics.ox.ac.uk">Oxford Roman Economy Project</a>, the following interactivity is provided:

- Change the base map and marker icons with the controls above
- Zoom and pan the map to target interesting regions
- Click icons for a "popup" providing further information about the mine
- Select "Some Plots" to compare the distribution of mines across regions, countries and more

The code for this visualisation is made available under a CC-BY license on <a href="https://github.com/ox-it/Live-Data_Case-Studies/tree/gh-pages/2016/Oxford-Roman-Economy-Project">GitHub</a>
